caption.title: Probability density plots of 6-month and 12-month Standardized Precipitation Evapotranspiration Index (SPEI) derived under baseline climate conditions (2003â€“2012) and under two future climate scenarios.
caption.p: SPEI values < 0 represent meteorological drought and the greater the absolute value, the higher the severity. SPEI values > 0 represent wetter than normal conditions.
